messages.title: PlayPalace Update 11.2.4
messages.message:
PlayPalace version 11.2.4 is now available with exciting new features!

**What's New:**
• Game Lobby Chat - Players not in a table can now chat together in the lobby and while browsing games
• New Games: Five Card Draw Poker, Texas Hold'em Poker, and Age of Heroes

**Feedback:**
Have suggestions? Visit playpalace.dev/feedback.html to share your thoughts.

Download the latest client today!
